titleStmt.title: The dignitie of preaching in a sermon vpon 1. Thessal. 5.20. By Sam. Hieron.
titleStmt.author: Hieron, Samuel, 1576?-1617.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Felix Kyngston for VVilliam Welby, and are to be sold at his shop at the signe of the Swanne in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Cf. Folger catalogue, which gives signatures: A-D⁴.
The first leaf is blank except for signature-mark "A".
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
